text: Gilberto Aceves Navarro (September 24, 1931 – October 21, 2019) was a Mexican painter and sculptor. He was a professor at the Escuela Nacional de Artes Plásticas and Academy of San Carlos. He had over 200 individual exhibits of his work with his murals found in Mexico, Japan and the United States. He received many awards for his work including grants as a Creador Artístico of the Sistema Nacional de Creadores de Arte, Premio Nacional de Ciencias y Artes and Bellas Artes Medal from the Instituto Nacional de Bellas Artes. Aceves Navarro died in Mexico City from lung disease at the age of 88.Murió el artista Gilberto Aceves Navarro ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Mexican painters Category:Mexican sculptors Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:Artists from Mexico City
title: Gilberto Aceves Navarro
